name: Type A Media
slogan: We show brands the optimal way to talk to more people online
description:
We are a digital marketing consultancy based out of London, England working with some of the coolest brands on the planet. From cool craft beer brands to the fortune 50, we are privileged to work with some of the best businesses in the world. 

Our primary offering is digital PR and data journalism - coming up with cool interactive content pieces (https://pudding.cool/) and pitching the story to magazines, newspapers and bloggers. 

We also have a burgeoning product division who are building the future of journalist communications with our journalist discovery platform. A tool that uses AI to read every article a person has ever written to understand what their beat is and what stories they would be most interested in

jobs.title: Public Relations (PR) Intern - $100 a day
jobs.description:
HOW TO APPLY

To apply for this job please book a time for an interview by following this calendarly link: https://calendly.com/typeacareers/international-pr


ABOUT THE JOB

We are looking for self motivated, creative communicators to join our remote PR and outreach team. 

This job is perfect for smart people looking to supplement their income whilst developing real life digital marketing skills that make you even more attractive to employers in the long run. Perfect for stay at home parents and graduates. 

You will be responsible for helping with PR and Outreach on some seriously cool brands, from craft beer to fortune 500 businesses. 

The job is a minimum of 2 days per week but can be flexible according to your schedule. 

The job involves:

• Helping us shape our creative and messaging for a US audience
• Prospecting suitable journalists
• Building relationships with journalists globally 
• Pitching stories and getting our clients coverage in the press
